item.title: DAL
item.description: score:40 Chances: With the pandemic behind us and fears of a recession starting to subside, Wall Street expects a big year as the consumer remains resilient, particularly in the travel industry. The travel sector saw a boom in 2023, and many investors look for ways to add great travel plays into their portfolios.
